Articles.Content:
I recently installed ksp 1.11 and noticed a strange bug with the Kerbal's suits.  Bill and Jeb were on a Duna SSTO mission when I installed the new version, and when I checked back to see the new changes and continue,  I immediately noticed that their suits had changed. They were both originally wearing the future suits from breaking ground and retained their suit colors, but the suits had changed to something completely different. They were actually quite futuristic and cool. I have no idea what caused this glitch or bug and I went into the code and saw that their suits were listed as default.  I'm sorry I don't have a closer up image, but this should be enough hopefully.  Also, when I attempted to plant a flag,  Bill and Jeb (I tried it with both of them) knocked the flag over right after planting it.  Does anybody know what's going on?

Edited December 18, 2020 by Orion Aerospace
Adding another issue
I fixed it by changing the code, but I still don't understand how the game just  suddenly"came up with" such cool suits.
